none: Robert Gass (with On Wings Of Song Singers) - Hara Hara
Robert Gass (with On Wings Of Song Singers)
Robert Gass (with On Wings Of Song Singers) - Hara Hara

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 18, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Another offering from Robert Gass and ON WINGS OF SONG - a solid hour of Eighties Americanized Eastern Enlightenment through chant. You put these tapes on and you forget they're playing. You put these on and you forget everything else. Maybe it's a trick, maybe it's a ruse. But maybe you need to spend some time with yourself today. Maybe you need to spend some time on yourself today. Never mind the higher power chants, never mind the repetition, never mind the message itself...mind the journey. Gass and his singers may have found what works for them. What works for you? HARA HARA
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2023/04/on-wings-of-song.html
